name: learn_agentic-workflows
description: Agentic Workflow Builder monorepo (web + server + shared packages)

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.build:packages: npm --workspace packages/types run build && npm --workspace packages/workflow-engine run build
scripts.build:server: npm run build:packages && npm --workspace apps/server run build
scripts.test: npm run test:engine && npm run test:server
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:server && npm run typecheck:web
